message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that is truly invaluable. This product holds immense worth to both of us, valued at $1200000. I am extending to you a special offer to purchase this item at a price that reflects its true value and significance. My proposal is to sell it to you for $1150000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a unique chance to own something truly remarkable. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to your positive response.
